Put mouse over identifiers to see inferred types 
 1: GHC.Types.Module{-# OPTIONS_GHC -fplugin=LiquidHaskellBoot #-}
 2: {-# LANGUAGE MagicHash #-}
 3: {-# OPTIONS_GHC -Wno-missing-signatures #-}
 4: module GHC.Types_LHAssumptions() where
 5: 
 6: import GHC.Types
 7: 
 8: -- This definition is needed to make the listed data constructors
 9: -- visible to LH
10: (GHC.Prim.Double# -> GHC.Types.Double, GHC.Prim.Float# -> GHC.Types.Float, GHC.Prim.Word# -> GHC.Types.Word)_f = (GHC.Types.DoubleD#, GHC.Types.FloatF#, GHC.Types.WordW#)
11: 
12: {-@
13: //  Boxed types
14: embed GHC.Types.Double  as real
15: embed GHC.Prim.Double#  as real
16: embed GHC.Types.Float   as real
17: embed GHC.Prim.Float#   as real
18: embed GHC.Types.Word    as int
19: embed GHC.Prim.Word#    as int
20: embed GHC.Prim.Word64#  as int
21: embed GHC.Types.Int     as int
22: embed GHC.Prim.Int#     as int
23: embed GHC.Types.Bool    as bool
24: embed GHC.Types.Char    as Char
25: embed GHC.Prim.Char#    as Char
26: embed GHC.Prim.Addr#    as Str
27: 
28: embed GHC.Num.Integer.Integer as int
29: 
30: assume GHC.Types.True    :: {v:GHC.Types.Bool | v     }
31: assume GHC.Types.False   :: {v:GHC.Types.Bool | (~ v) }
32: assume GHC.Types.isTrue# :: n:_ -> {v:GHC.Types.Bool | (n = 1 <=> v)}
33: 
34: assume GHC.Types.D# :: x:GHC.Prim.Double# -> {v: GHC.Types.Double | v = (x :: real) }
35: assume GHC.Types.F# :: x:GHC.Prim.Float# -> {v: GHC.Types.Float | v = (x :: real) }
36: assume GHC.Types.I# :: x:GHC.Prim.Int# -> {v: GHC.Types.Int | v = (x :: int) }
37: assume GHC.Types.C# :: x:GHC.Prim.Char# -> {v: GHC.Types.Char | v = (x :: Char) }
38: assume GHC.Types.W# :: w:GHC.Prim.Word# -> {v:GHC.Types.Word | v == w }
39: 
40: measure addrLen :: GHC.Prim.Addr# -> GHC.Types.Int
41: 
42: type GeInt N = {v: GHC.Types.Int | v >= N }
43: type LeInt N = {v: GHC.Types.Int | v <= N }
44: type Nat     = {v: GHC.Types.Int | v >= 0 }
45: type Even    = {v: GHC.Types.Int | (v mod 2) = 0 }
46: type Odd     = {v: GHC.Types.Int | (v mod 2) = 1 }
47: type BNat N  = {v: Nat           | v <= N }
48: type TT      = {v: GHC.Types.Bool | v}
49: type FF      = {v: GHC.Types.Bool | not v}
50: type String  = [GHC.Types.Char]
51: 
52: class measure len :: forall f a. f a -> GHC.Types.Int
53: @-}
